---
title: "Presentación Beamer en Modo Oscuro"
author: "Seminario de Tópicos Selectos del Trabajo Social"
date: ""
format:
  beamer:
    theme: Dresden
    colortheme: beetle
    slide-level: 2
    pdf-engine: xelatex
resources:
  - fn.png
  - fnd.png
header-includes:
  - |
    % Paquetes
    \usepackage{graphicx}
    \usepackage{tikz}
    \usepackage{xcolor}

    % --- MODO OSCURO (texto, estructura, etc.) ---
    \setbeamercolor{background canvas}{bg=black}
    \setbeamercolor{normal text}{fg=white}
    \setbeamercolor{structure}{fg=white}
    \setbeamercolor{itemize item}{fg=white}
    % (Opcional) bloques en oscuro:
    % \setbeamercolor{block title}{fg=white,bg=black}
    % \setbeamercolor{block body}{fg=white,bg=black}

    % --- PLANTILLAS DE FONDO ---
    % Fondo por defecto (todas las diapositivas): negro + imagen tenue
    \newcommand{\normalbg}{%
      \usebackgroundtemplate{%
        \begin{tikzpicture}[remember picture,overlay]
          \fill[black] (current page.south west) rectangle (current page.north east);
          \node[opacity=.15] at (current page.center)
            {\includegraphics[width=\paperwidth,height=\paperheight,keepaspectratio]{fnd.png}};
        \end{tikzpicture}}}

    % Fondo de la portada: negro + imagen completa
    \newcommand{\titlebg}{%
      \usebackgroundtemplate{%
        \begin{tikzpicture}[remember picture,overlay]
          \fill[black] (current page.south west) rectangle (current page.north east);
          \node at (current page.center)
            {\includegraphics[width=\paperwidth,height=\paperheight,keepaspectratio]{fn.png}};
        \end{tikzpicture}}}

    % Aplicar fondo normal al inicio
    \AtBeginDocument{\normalbg}

    % Cambiar solo durante la title page y restaurar después
    \addtobeamertemplate{title page}{\titlebg}{\normalbg}
editor: visual
---
